data.title: Product Support Lifecycle
data.meta_description: Micro Focus' product support lifecycle has guidelines for the availability and level of support during the life of a product under an active maintenance agreement.
data.text:
Status column explained:

Current Maintenance = Technical Support + Software Updates + Defect Support

All product versions for which Current Maintenance has ended are under Sustaining Maintenance.

Sustaining Maintenance = Online Support resources (no Technical Support) + Software Updates (no Defect Support)

Additional programs available:

Extended Support = Technical Support + Software Updates + Defect Support for Sev 1

available for 2 years after end of Current Maintenance for an additional fee

Limited Extended Support = Technical Support + Software Updates (no Defect Support)

available after the end of Extended Support for an additional fee

(See details in the Lifecycle Policy)

Status column explained:

Sustaining Maintenance = Online Support resources (no Technical Support) + Software Updates (no Defect Support or license keys)

Out of Support = Product and support no longer available

(See details in the Lifecycle Policy)
